content: <start> obligations: Machine Learning, Compilers; Other possible obligations could include research in Transformers or attending conferences related to AI/ML advancements. Dr. Jan de Vries is an Assistant Professor at Utrecht University specializing in machine learning with a focus on transformer models and compilers for 3 years, preferring speakers like Catherine Miller and Brian Lee.<end>
Get user's desire by asking explorative questions about what they want other topics they want to explore beside their obligation. Summarize that as user desire that says 'DESIRES:'
